definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: reach, overtake (Sir 14:13 [[והשיגת ידך]], Sir 35:10 [[ובהשגת יד]] (cf. Schechter on Sir 14:13), cf.
infr.; [[ישיג מענה]] Sir 32:14 shall obtain an answer;—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[וְהִשִּׂיג]] consec. Le 25:6, sf. [[וְהִשִּׂיגוֹ]] consec. De 19:6; 2 ms. sf. [[וְהִשַּׂגְתָּם]] consec. Ge 44:4, etc.; Impf. [[יַשִּׂיג]] Le 26:5, [[וַיַּשֵּׂג]] Ge 31:25, sf. [[וַיַּשִּׂגֵם]] Ge 44:26, etc.; Inf. abs. [[הַשֵּׂג]] 1Sa 30:8; Pt. [[מַשִּׂיג]] 1Sa 14:26, sf. [[מַשִּׂיגֵ֫הוּ]] Job 41:18; f. [[מַשֶּׂגֶת]] Le 14:21, 1Ch 21:12 (but rd. [[וְאִם הֱיוֹת]] as ‖ 2Sa 24:13 We:Sm Kit);—

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig. of battle Ho 10:9, sword Je 42:16; on 1Ch 21:12 v. supr.; of blessings De 28:2, curses v:De 28:15; v:De 28:45, predictions Zec 1:6, justice Is 59:9, wrath of ´[[י]] Ps 69:25, iniquities Ps 40:13, calamities Job 27:20.

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: reach, attain to, Job 41:18 (if one) reach it (crocodile) with the sword (2 acc.); fig. paths of life Pr 2:19, joy, etc., Is 35:10 also Is 51:11 (Che:Hpt [[יַשִּׂיגוּם]], for MT [[יַשִּׂיגוּן]]; Perles:Analekten 64 [[יִשְׂגּוּן]], fr. [[שׂגה]]); of time Ge 47:9 my days have not reached the days ... of my fathers, cf. Le 26:5, Le 26:5.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: cause to reach, bring, put, [[מַשִּׂיג יׇדוֹ אֶל־פִּיו]] 1Sa 14:26 no one put his hand to his mouth, but rd. [[מֵשִׁיב]] LXX Targum Klo Dr Bu Kit HPS Löhr.

fig. [[הִשִּׁיגׇה יׇדוֹ]] one's hand has reached, i.e. one is able, or has enough, Le 5:11 (c. [[לְ]]), Le 14:21, Le 25:26, Le 25:49; c. acc. = able to secure, get Le 14:22, Le 14:30, Le 14:31, Le 14:32, Le 27:8, Nu 6:21 (all P), Ez Eze 46:7; abs. = gain (riches) Le 25:47 (H).—Job 24:2 v. [[סוּג]].
